content: The Tiny Piece of Gold is one of the basic Treasures in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike other Crafting Materials, this can be sold as soon as you get it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiny_Piece_of_Gold.md', within the main section titled 'Tiny Piece of Gold'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiny Piece of Gold is one of the basic Treasures in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike other Crafting Materials, this can be sold as soon as you get it.
